title: NDTV: "No Posters Or Bribes, Vote For Me If You Want To": Nitin Gadkari

comments: One of the most corrupt politicians, and yet gets things done and is acceptable to both sides of the aisle. He's also a. committed RSS mam through and through. But I've never seen him engage in Hindu - Muslim nonsense and fanning hatred. Interesting politician, I respect and loathe him at the same time.
Seems he is really angry with mudi

says the guy who robbed paving the road. - CAG
"It should have been me, not him"

Similar take. But i feel least corrupt of the lot. Isn't after lofty designs atleast his image doesn't seem to be. He doesn't shove ideology in anyone's face. Our highways are so good. And some credit goes to him.
Only leader in bjp with 56inch chest
Exception? He is part of the system.
